ygData.subject: RE: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The AC buff from these songs is really minor.  Something like +2 AC for ER w/o a drum, +4 with in your mid 20s.  For Guardian I believe it s +4 AC w/o a
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 3 Sep 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> Hmm so you trade the AC for the specic fire/cold magic resists?
>
> I was playing Guardian for the AC party buff and Largos for the AC mob
> debuff - even when we were fighting non-casters. But vs casters I can see

The AC buff from these songs is really minor. Something like
+2 AC for ER w/o a drum, +4 with in your mid 20s. For
Guardian I believe it's +4 AC w/o a drum, +8 with. So the
difference, especially if you're not using a drum, is close to
negligible.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
